comment: I really love this app, truly! But there is one thing that is really bugging me. The lag... When I put an effect it lags, like really lags, and when i play a video it lags too and it doesn't align with the music, it's quite annoying I'll be honest with you. I really hope this will be fix because I really love this app, like really really love! This would be the best video editing if you fixed the lag in my opinion.\u9983\u30ba\u9983\u30ba
scenarios: When I put an effect, it lags.
When I play a video, it lags and doesn't align with the music.
key sentence: When I play a video, it lags and doesn't align with the music.
the function of activity: The activity allows users to select and edit templates, manage music tracks, export projects, and access author information while facilitating media playback.
the sub-task list of state: [{'name': 'Template Selection', 'description': 'Select different templates available for the current project or file.'}, {'name': 'Export', 'description': 'Initiate the export process for the current file or project.'}, {'name': 'Edit', 'description': 'Open the editing interface to make changes to the current item.'}, {'name': 'Replace Music', 'description': 'Replace the current background music with a different track.'}, {'name': 'Play', 'description': 'Start or resume the playback of the video or audio track.'}, {'name': 'Select Music', 'description': 'Choose a music track from the available options for replacement.'}, {'name': 'Show Author Info', 'description': 'Display information about the author of the current template.'}]
